azurerm_api_management_identity_provider.description: Manages an API Management Google Identity Provider.

api_management_name.description: The Name of the API Management Service where this Google Identity Provider should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The Name of the Resource Group where the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Google Identity Provider.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Google Identity Provider.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Google Identity Provider.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Google Identity Provider.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Google Identity Provider.
